com.neu.prattle.service.user

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserService
    Acts as an interface between the data layer and the servlet controller. The controller is responsible for interfacing with this instance to perform all the CRUD operations on user accounts.
    Version:
    dated 2019-10-06
    Author:
    CS5500 Fall 2019 Teaching staff

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUser(User user)
      Tries to add a user in the system
      java.util.Optional<User> findUserByName(java.lang.String name)
      Returns an optional object which might be empty or wraps an object if the System contains a User object having the same name as the parameter.
      java.util.Set<User> findUserByPartialName(java.lang.String partialName)
      Returns a list of users that partially match the given nameobject having the same name as the parameter.
      static java.lang.String generateUserList(java.util.Set<User> users)
      Returns a string representation of a list of users
      User protectedfindUserByName(java.lang.String name)
      Attempts to return the user associated with the name and throws and error if the user doesn't exist

      • findUserByName

        java.util.Optional<User> findUserByName(java.lang.String name)
        Returns an optional object which might be empty or wraps an object if the System contains a User object having the same name as the parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the user
        Returns:
        Optional object.

      • findUserByPartialName

        java.util.Set<User> findUserByPartialName(java.lang.String partialName)
        Returns a list of users that partially match the given nameobject having the same name as the parameter.
        Parameters:
        partialName - The partial name of the user
        Returns:
        List which is empty if there are no partial matches

      • protectedfindUserByName

        User protectedfindUserByName(java.lang.String name)
        Attempts to return the user associated with the name and throws and error if the user doesn't exist
        Parameters:
        name - - The name of the user.
        Returns:
        The associated user.
